thread.title: Facebook’s Boldest Privacy Tool Is Coming Soon - WSJ

author: Katherine Bindley
title: Facebook’s Boldest Privacy Tool Is Coming Soon - WSJ
text:
Facebook Inc. is giving users the ability to see and control data Facebook receives about them from outside apps and websites that use the company’s ads and analytics tools.
Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg announced the “Clear History” tool Tuesday, ahead of the company’s F8 developers conference in San Jose, Calif.
